ns2:testcase.ns3:title: FS-TEL-003/3.2.3.2/ID Capture/ Verify system must require identification details whenever cashout is involved/Customer/ IRA Contribution
ns2:testcase.ns3:description:
Whenever Cash Out is involved, for each instance of the transactions listed the system will require the following fields to be captured as part of the transaction:
Name : The name of the person performing the transaction. ID Type: The type of ID being used by the person performing the transaction. This is to be a selection set ID Issuer: the authority issuing the ID ID Number: The ID number of the ID type being used by the person performing the transaction ID Expiration date: The date which the present ID is to expire MM/DD/CCYY- if applicable
Payee reference account : Mandatory if customer is selected and cash out greater then zero, optional otherwise. Type :Drop down includes D:DEP and L :Loan type of payee .reference account of the customer
Quick view : Link to launch a Quick View of the Payee / Reference account entered
Known: Check box available if the user knows the customer by name.
Success Criteria: The system must allow to capture the identification details of the customer by providing standard fields on the transaction screen.
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: v070808

ns2:com.ibm.rqm.planning.editor.section..tag0:div:
Product: Teller
Type of Transaction:
IRA Contribution
User: Authorized User
Screen: Institution Parameter - Create/Amend/Inquiry (Screen 31151)
IRA ContributionTransaction Screen.
-A successful transaction must occur at the core.
- The customer must cash out certain or all of the deposited amount.
-Cashout must be involved in the transaction other wise the identification details section will be hidden
